---
name: V1.4 PR Workflow
on:
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]
permissions:
  contents: write
  pull_requests: write
outputs:
  add-comment: true
  add-label: true
  create-pr: { sign: true }
  update-file: true
allowed-paths:
  - "**/*.md"
  - ".github/**/*"
allowed-actors:
  - write
  - admin
rate_limit_minutes: 5
---

# V1.4 PR Workflow Agent

This agent performs automated PR reviews and updates.

Features:
- Can create PRs with signed commits
- Can update markdown and GitHub config files
- Rate limited to avoid spam
- Restricted to users with write access
